subject: Application for Full Stack Developer Intern - Ankit Kumar
body:
Hi {receiverName},

I am writing to express my interest in the internship opportunity at {companyName}. As a final-year B.Tech student in Information Technology at BPIT Rohini, Delhi, I am passionate about leveraging technology to solve real-world problems and have experience in full-stack development (ReactJS, NodeJS, ExpressJS, MongoDB).

One of my recent projects, HELP-BPIT, is a MERN-based platform that enables real-time communication through open forum chat (Socket.IO), academic collaboration through a book and notes-sharing module, and community support with a Lost-and-Found section. It uses JWT-based authentication and is styled with TailwindCSS for a responsive, user-friendly interface.

This project highlights my ability to build functional, scalable solutions that align with {companyName}'s commitment to innovation.

Please find my resume attached for your reference. I would be happy to discuss how my skills can contribute to your team.

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards,

Ankit Kumar

+91-7827797430
